Description:
Kizumonogatari Part 2: Nekketsu Original Soundtrack (「傷物語」劇伴音楽集 其ノ貳 熱血篇, "Kizumonogatari" Gekiban Ongakushuu Sono Ni Nekketsu Hen) is the film soundtrack album for the second film in the trilogy.
Like the first film soundtrack, there are two versions with the standard version on CD while the limited version on Vinyl. Both of them are released in Japan on December 21, 2016.[1][2] The Limited Edition is exclusive to Japan. The Standard Edition was released in North America on May 9, 2017 alongside the Blu-ray.[3]
It is composed by Satoru Kosaki.
